headline: Deere Calls 2026 the Bottom as Caterpillar Rides Energy Growth Past Estimates
summary: Caterpillar (NYSE: CAT) and Deere & Company (NYSE: DE) both reported results showing the same headwinds hitting in very different ways. Caterpillar beat estimates with modest earnings pressure. Deere missed badly, with full-year net income down 29% as the agricultural downcycle crushed core segments. One Diversifies Through the Storm. One Takes It on the Chin. ... Deere Calls 2026 the Bottom as Caterpillar Rides Energy Growth Past Estimates

headline: Dow Rises as Big Players Gain. Most S&P 500 Constituents Are Up.
summary: Many of the Dow and S&P 500 stocks pushed higher shortly after the open, pushing the indexes above the breakeven line.  The Dow, popularly known as Wall Street's blue-chip index that tracks stocks of well-known and financially stable companies, was up 0.2%.  The S&P 500 was a few points above yesterday's close.

headline: Caterpillar Inc. Maintains Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) voted to maintain the quarterly dividend of one dollar and fifty-one cents ($1.51) per share of common stock payable Feb. 19, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business Jan. 20, 2026.

headline: Investors Heavily Search Caterpillar Inc. (CAT): Here is What You Need to Know
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Caterpillar (CAT). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
